name: Safety, Rehabilitation and Compensation (Defence-related Claims) Act 1988 (Demo Excerpt)

sections.title: Eligibility for compensation
sections.description: Member must have sustained injury or disease during defence service while on duty

sections.title: Minimum service period
sections.description: Minimum 90 days continuous service required for rehabilitation benefits

sections.title: Weekly compensation rate
sections.description: Weekly compensation calculated at 85% of normal weekly earnings

sections.title: Medical treatment cap
sections.description: Medical costs exceeding $5,000 require prior approval

sections.title: Permanent impairment threshold
sections.description: Permanent impairment compensation payable at 10+ impairment points
